title: How to log back into Raspberry Pi - Quora

response.answer_text: Rasp provides an alternative which I haven’t tried myself yet (Not willing to play around with passwords). Try this out… Remove the sd card and insert it on a pc.open the file ‘cmdline.txt’ and add ‘init=/bin/sh' to the end of the file.put it back in to the pi and boot it.type ‘su’ to login as root in terminal.type in ‘passwd pi’ and follow the steps to enter a new passwordonce done , remove the sd card and edit the cmdline.txt file to remove the line we added earlier - “int=/bin/sh”
